body: In this early stage of the campaign for president, the focus has been more on atmospherics and platitudes than issues. But there's expected to be action on Capitol Hill Wednesday on a trade bill that's putting candidates on the spot.
description: In this early stage of the campaign for president, the focus has been more on atmospherics and platitudes than issues. But there's expected to be action on Capitol Hill Wednesday on a trade bill that's putting candidates on the spot.
title: Fast-Track Trade Authority Debate Puts Presidential Candidates On The Spot
